projects.name: Working model of secure firewall for an end to end encrypted messaging app
projects.description: Developed a Secure Firewall Model: Designed and implemented a secure firewall for an end-to-end encrypted messaging app, optimizing firewall rules and enhancing threat detection through deep packet inspection and access control. Conducted testing under simulated attack scenarios to validate security effectiveness.

experiences.description: Vulnerability detection at network, application and host level. Built mechanisms to secure application (encryption) and LAN. Packet sniffing and analysing with wireshark. Worked with snort, Nessus, suricata, Metasploit, open dlp. ARP spoofing and jailbreak vulnerability attacks used to ethical hack and secure LAN and application. Research on Cyber espionages in india and capturing 4G/LTE packets. Hands-on experience with SIEM, EDR, and DLP tools. Understanding of the MITRE ATT&CK framework. Familiarity with NIST, ISO 27001, and CIS controls.

Worked on pentesting tools (Hydra, Auxiliary, john the ripper on metasploitable server, Nse scripts, crunch tool). Enhanced network security by conducting vulnerability assessments and implementing recommended patches. Threat Intelligence: Developed and managed threat intelligence programs, performed deep-dive analysis of cyber threats.

Reviewed firewall configurations and rulesets for optimal performance, reducing exposure to external threats. Encrypted data and erected firewalls to protect confidential information. Cyber Threat Hunting: Led proactive threat-hunting operations using tools like Splunk and Elastic Stack, developed custom scripts for anomaly detection.

full_output.name: K.S.Prathyusha
achievements_and_awards: Pursuing ncc in airwing (cleared b certificate)
